-| diffsc(hs1, c0)
-| diffsc(hs1, crn(cfv(cpjh, c0)))

⊢ ran((projh ` c0))= c0
⊣ c0 ∈ CH
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs1, c0)
⊣ d(hs1, ran((projh ` c0)))

comment: The range of a projection. Part of Theorem 26.2 of [Halmos] p. 44. (Contributed by NM, 30-Oct-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)
